name: PDFXStandard
shortdesc: This provides a means for matching the color characteristics of a PDF document.

property.name: PDFXNONE
property.shortdesc: The user isn't complying with any PDF standard.

property.name: PDFX1A2001
property.shortdesc: Supports only a CMYK and spot color workflow, targeted to a specific output device.

property.name: PDFX1A2003
property.shortdesc: Supports only a CMYK and spot color workflow, targeted to a specific output device.

property.name: PDFX32001
property.shortdesc: Supports a color-managed workflow, allowing the use of device-independent color in addition to CMYK and spot colors.

property.name: PDFX32002
property.shortdesc: Supports a color-managed workflow, allowing the use of device-independent color in addition to CMYK and spot colors.

property.name: PDFX32003
property.shortdesc: Supports a color-managed workflow, allowing the use of device-independent color in addition to CMYK and spot colors.

property.name: PDFX42007
property.shortdesc: Supports a color-managed workflow, allowing the use of device-independent color in addition to CMYK and spot colors.
